author: cnbc.com
title: Pinnacle Bancshares Declares $0.11 Per Share Quarterly Cash Dividend
text:
JASPER, Ala.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Pinnacle Bancshares, Inc. (OTC PINK: PCLB) today announced that its Board of Directors has approved a quarterly cash dividend of $0.11 per share. The dividend is payable March 23, 2018 to stockholders of record on March 12, 2018. The quarterly amount is equivalent to an annualized rate of $0.44 per share.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180228006044/en/
Pinnacle Bancshares, Inc.
Joe Adams, III, CFO
